DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate blood level canagliflozin healthy volunteer administration multiple-doses rifampin .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effects Rifampin Single-Dose Pharmacokinetics Canagliflozin Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( volunteer study staff know identity study drug assign ) study canagliflozin rifampin take sequential order healthy volunteer 12 day . Healthy volunteer take orally ( mouth ) one 300 mg canagliflozin tablet and/or two 300 mg rifampin capsule daily sequential order follow : Day 1 volunteer take one 300-mg canagliflozin tablet , Days 4 9 volunteer take two 300-mg rifampin capsule daily , Day 10 volunteer take one 300-mg canagliflozin tablet + two 300-mg rifampin capsule , Days 11 12 volunteer take two 300-mg rifamplin capsule daily .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer body mass index 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) History current medical illness deem clinically significant Investigator
